title.rendered: Find Rooms For Rent In Mountain View

content.rendered:
Mountain View, California is a city located in the South Bay region of the San Francisco Bay Area. It’s known for its good weather, culture, and for being home to many tech giants like Google! Mountain View is one of the few cities in America that has a true mixed culture. For those who would love to live in a place that is a melting pot of culture and activities, we are here to help you find cheap rooms for rent in Mountain View. Keep reading to find out about the lifestyle, culture, and average rent in Mountain View.

Getting to Know Mountain View

Mountain View, California is located in Santa Clara County, and the weather in the city is typically mild during the year. The city covers an area of about 12.9 square miles and has a population of approximately 76,000 residents. What Mountain View lacks in history, it makes up for in innovative business opportunities and has been at the forefront of innovation since the creation of Silicon Valley. If you want to live in a quiet city with great job opportunities, then try looking for some cheap rooms for rent in Mountain View.

Related: Looking for a roommate? Here are some qualities to look for!

Finding rooms for rent in Mountain View

Find Rooms For Rent In Mountain View, CA

With hundreds of options and houses on the expensive side, it can feel like a chore to find cheap rooms for rent in Mountain View – but we’ve got your back!

Based on the most recent research, the average rent for rooms in Mountain View is $2,719. The average size for a Mountain View apartment is 825 square feet, though this can differ based on the unit type. Renter-occupied households account for 43% of the total occupied housing units in the state.

Top neighbourhoods in Mountain View

  • Old Mountain View- The neighborhood covers a total area of 1.8 square miles with approximately 1/3 of that being occupied by commercial zones which include several shopping centers and restaurants. The neighborhood is a diverse downtown with a variety of restaurants, parks, and pubs.
  • Cuesta Park- You will have a lot of options for rooms for rent in Mountain View in this beautiful neighborhood. The best words to describe Cuseta Park are quiet and convenient. The architecture and interiors of the houses in this neighborhood are also traditional and elegant – perfect for those looking for a timeless home.
  • Monta Loma- One of the most peaceful neighborhoods in the city, Monta Loma is a place with rich history and is on the doorstep of Google Inc. The easy accessibility and availability of all amenities and important sites make this neighborhood one of the best places to find rooms for rent in Mountain View, California.

Related: Find Rooms For Rent In Santa Clara

Average rent in Mountain View

University life in Mountain View

Filled with fun activities and some of the best universities, finding rooms for rent in Mountain View can be a route to making a lifetime of memories. With a lot of eateries, parks, and coffee shops, Mountain View is the ideal place for students to live in California. Here are the top 5 universities you should check out!

  • Stanford University
  • Palo Alto University
  • Santa Clara University
  • Northwestern Polytechnic University
  • Carnegie Mellon University

Related: Decorating Your Off-Campus Housing Or Apartment On A Budget

How transit friendly is Mountain View?

Mountain View was ranked as the 3rd most transit-friendly city in California by Wallethub. The public transportation system is reliable, safe, and affordable, which is why they rank so high. Even if you don’t drive, you’ll always find ways to get around the city without any trouble.

1. Taxis

When you need a ride in an emergency, or you’re looking for rooms to rent in Mountain View, you can always count on the taxi services here. Uber and Lyft are also available, along with plenty of local cab service companies.

2. Walkability

The city of Mountain View is the eighth most walkable city out of the ten cities in Santa Clara county. City leaders are making efforts to encourage people to take alternative transportation methods other than driving cars, by creating bike lanes and reducing traffic congestion. For those who are looking for rooms for rent in Mountain View and love walking – San Antonio, Old Mountain View, and Shoreline West are the most walkable neighborhoods in the city.

3. Public Transportation

The cheapest way to get around the city is by using the bus services. Transportation services by Mountain View Transit (MVT) and the Santa Clara Valley Transportation Authority (VTA) are the ones you can rely on for your daily travel. You can also count on Mountain View Community Shuttle which is independent of VTA and is free of cost.

4. Trains

The local train in Mountain View known as Caltrain connects the city with the neighboring cities and is a pocket-friendly way to get around the city. There is also a discount for youth and senior passengers. So, give Caltrain a shot when you are out looking for rooms for rent in Mountain View.

Cultural activities in Mountain View

The Mountain View community is always full of exciting activities. Whether it’s a concert at Shoreline Amphitheater, a movie at the new AMC theater downtown, or a tour of the Googleplex – there is something for everyone!

Shoreline Amphitheater

With amazing views of San Francisco Bay and Silicon Valley, Shoreline Amphitheater in Mountain View is a prime location for a concert experience you’ll never forget. The setup is also unique – unlike other venues, you can be assigned seating or floor sections that are usually reserved for VIP tickets.

AMC theater

AMC Theatre is a place you should add to your to-do list when you are in Mountain View. In addition to traditional movie offerings such as blockbusters and animated features, they also offer unique experiences at their theatre. The Dolby Cinema experience includes laser projection that provides richer colors and sharper details.

Stevens Creek Trail

Stevens Creek Trail in Mountain View is a popular trail among bikers, runners, and hikers. When you get to the intersection with Page Mill Road and CA-85, you’ll find a wide range of restaurants that offer outdoor seating overlooking the water (so if you’re running early, there’s no excuse not to grab a quick bite while enjoying some fresh air).

Restaurants in Mountain View

The restaurants in Mountain View are simply amazing. A combination of Bay Area draw and local talent has created an unparalleled dining scene. Nowhere else can you find such an array of cuisine and styles of cooking – from pizzas to sushi to traditional American fare complete with steaks!

  • Doppio Zero– Doppio Zero, an Italian restaurant in Mountain View, is the perfect place to visit when you’re craving authentic Italian food. They serve delicious dishes with homemade pasta and fresh seafood. Their prices are reasonable with large portions for a fair price. There’s outdoor seating right next to their white picket fence, under the shade of a tree. It’s a great place to sit back and relax while enjoying your food!
  • Cascal– Cascal is a full-service restaurant in Mountain View that fuses Pacific-Rim cuisine with California’s bounty. The name “Cascal” literally means “intensely flavored food” and serves as an umbrella term for the entire menu. The talent behind the delicious food is a team of chefs who have worked around the world at Michelin-starred restaurants. They strive to create a dining experience that is as unique as their menu items themselves.
  • XANH– Restaurant XANH is an authentic Vietnamese “banh mi” restaurant located on Castro St. in Mountain View, CA. They offer a variety of traditional sandwiches and it’s a great place to stop by for lunch during a busy day at the office. Their cuisine has rich flavor profiles with bold ingredients like lemongrass, ginger, chili peppers, and fresh herbs to support local farmers and fishermen who harvest shrimp, fish, and oysters from nearby waters.

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find rooms for rent in Mountain View? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
